languages.text: {n}На ваш возглас нет ответа. Ближайший техножрец — IH-630 — замер в неестественной позе, будто его пронизанное имплантами тело сведено судорогой. Краем глаза вы видите нечто невероятное — сам свет на мостике ведет себя странно, будто отрезая вас и массивный когитатор от окружающего дрожащим маревом.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}На ваш возглас нет ответа. Ближайший техножрец — IH-630 — замер в неестественной позе, будто его пронизанное имплантами тело сведено судорогой. Краем глаза вы видите нечто невероятное — сам свет на мостике ведет себя странно, будто отрезая вас и массивный когитатор от окружающего дрожащим маревом.{/n}

languages.text: {n}No answer comes. The Tech-Priest standing closest to you, IH-630, is frozen in an unnatural pose, as if his whole implant-ridden body has seized up. Out of the corner of your eye, you notice something incredible — the light on the bridge is acting strangely, coalescing into a vibrating haze that separates you and the massive cogitator from the surrounding world.{/n}

Out of the corner of your eye, you notice something incredible — the light on the bridge is acting strangely, coalescing into a vibrating haze that separates you and the massive cogitator from the surrounding world.{/n}

Out of the corner of your eye, you notice something incredible — the light on the bridge is acting strangely, coalescing into a vibrating haze that separates you and the massive cogitator from the surrounding world.{/n}

languages.text: {n}何も答えはなかった。あなたに一番近いところに立っている技術司祭、IH-630は不自然な姿勢で固まっており、まるでインプラントに繋がれた彼の全身が動かなくなったかのようだ。あなたは視界の端に信じられないものを見つけた。ブリッジの上のライトが奇妙な動きで、あなたと考算機を周りの世界から隔てる、振動する霞に融合していたのだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}No answer comes. The Tech-Priest standing closest to you, IH-630, is frozen in an unnatural pose, as if his whole implant-ridden body has seized up. Out of the corner of your eye, you notice something incredible — the light on the bridge is acting strangely, coalescing into a vibrating haze that separates you and the massive cogitator from the surrounding world.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}何も答えはなかった。あなたに一番近いところに立っている技術司祭、IH-630は不自然な姿勢で固まっており、まるでインプラントに繋がれた彼の全身が動かなくなったかのようだ。あなたは視界の端に信じられないものを見つけた。ブリッジの上のライトが奇妙な動きで、あなたと考算機を周りの世界から隔てる、振動する霞に融合していたのだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}你没有听到任何应答。离你最近的技术神甫IH-630号，此刻突然以极其不自然的姿势僵在了那里，就好像满是植入物的身体被卡住了一样。你眼角的余光瞥到了不可思议的景象——舰桥上的光线变得古怪，逐渐变成了某种波动的薄雾，将你和巨大的沉思者笼罩其中，从外部世界隔离开来。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}No answer comes. The Tech-Priest standing closest to you, IH-630, is frozen in an unnatural pose, as if his whole implant-ridden body has seized up. Out of the corner of your eye, you notice something incredible — the light on the bridge is acting strangely, coalescing into a vibrating haze that separates you and the massive cogitator from the surrounding world.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你没有听到任何应答。离你最近的技术祭司IH-630号，此刻突然以极其不自然的姿势僵在了那里，就好像满是植入物的身体被卡住了一样。你眼角的余光瞥到了不可思议的景象——舰桥上的光线变得古怪，逐渐变成了某种波动的薄雾，将你和巨大的思考器笼罩其中，从外部世界隔离开来。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Es kommt keine Antwort. Der Techpriester, der dir am nächsten steht, IH-630, ist in einer unnatürlichen Pose erstarrt, als habe sich sein gesamter von Implantaten durchzogener Körper verkrampft. Aus dem Augenwinkel bemerkst du etwas Unglaubliches — das Licht auf der Brücke verhält sich merkwürdig. Es verschmilzt zu einem vibrierenden Nebel, der dich und den riesigen Cogitator von der Welt außen herum abtrennt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}No answer comes. The Tech-Priest standing closest to you, IH-630, is frozen in an unnatural pose, as if his whole implant-ridden body has seized up. Out of the corner of your eye, you notice something incredible — the light on the bridge is acting strangely, coalescing into a vibrating haze that separates you and the massive cogitator from the surrounding world.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Es kommt keine Antwort. Der Techpriester, der dir am nächsten steht, IH-630, ist in einer unnatürlichen Pose erstarrt, als habe sich sein gesamter von Implantaten durchzogener Körper verkrampft. Aus dem Augenwinkel bemerkst du etwas Unglaubliches — das Licht auf der Brücke verhält sich merkwürdig. Es verschmilzt zu einem vibrierenden Nebel, der dich und den riesigen Cogitator von der Welt außen herum abtrennt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Personne ne répond. Le technoprêtre le plus proche de vous, IH-630, est figé dans une position anormale, comme si ses nombreux implants avaient tous cessé de fonctionner. Du coin de l'œil, vous remarquez un incroyable spectacle : les lumières de la passerelle semblent s'unir et se fondre en une brume chatoyante qui vous sépare, vous et l'énorme cogitateur, du monde environnant.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}No answer comes. The Tech-Priest standing closest to you, IH-630, is frozen in an unnatural pose, as if his whole implant-ridden body has seized up. Out of the corner of your eye, you notice something incredible — the light on the bridge is acting strangely, coalescing into a vibrating haze that separates you and the massive cogitator from the surrounding world.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Personne ne répond. Le technoprêtre le plus proche de vous, IH-630, est figé dans une position anormale, comme si ses nombreux implants avaient tous cessé de fonctionner. Du coin de l'œil, vous remarquez un incroyable spectacle : les lumières de la passerelle semblent s'unir et se fondre en une brume chatoyante qui vous sépare, vous et l'énorme cogitateur, du monde environnant.{/n}

languages.text: {n}No hay respuesta. El tecnosacerdote que tienes más cerca, IH-630, está paralizado en una postura antinatural, como si todos los implantes de su cuerpo se hubiesen bloqueado. Divisas algo increíble por el rabillo del ojo: las luces del puente actúan de un modo extraño, concentrándose en una especie de halo trémulo que os separa al cogitador y a ti del entorno circundante.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}No answer comes. The Tech-Priest standing closest to you, IH-630, is frozen in an unnatural pose, as if his whole implant-ridden body has seized up. Out of the corner of your eye, you notice something incredible — the light on the bridge is acting strangely, coalescing into a vibrating haze that separates you and the massive cogitator from the surrounding world.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}No hay respuesta. El tecnosacerdote que tienes más cerca, IH-630, está paralizado en una postura antinatural, como si todos los implantes de su cuerpo se hubiesen bloqueado. Divisas algo increíble por el rabillo del ojo: las luces del puente actúan de un modo extraño, concentrándose en una especie de halo trémulo que os separa al cogitador y a ti del entorno circundante.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Cevap gelmiyor. En yakınındaki IH-630 Sayılı Tekno Rahip, doğal olmayan bir pozisyonda donup kalmış. İmplantlarla dolup taşan bedeni, tutukluk yapmış gibi görünüyor. Göz ucuyla inanılmaz bir şey fark ediyorsun: Köprüdeki ışıklar bir tuhaf davranıyor, kaynaşarak titreyen bir bulanıklığa dönüşüyor, seni ve devasa kavramsayarı etrafınızdaki dünyadan ayırıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}No answer comes. The Tech-Priest standing closest to you, IH-630, is frozen in an unnatural pose, as if his whole implant-ridden body has seized up. Out of the corner of your eye, you notice something incredible — the light on the bridge is acting strangely, coalescing into a vibrating haze that separates you and the massive cogitator from the surrounding world.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Cevap gelmiyor. En yakınındaki Tekno Rahip IH-630, doğal olmayan bir pozisyonda donup kalmış; implantlarla dolup taşan bedeni tutukluk yapmış gibi görünüyor. Göz ucuyla inanılmaz bir şey fark ediyorsun: Köprüdeki ışıklar bir tuhaf davranıyor; kaynaşarak titreyen bir bulanıklığa dönüşüyor, seni ve devasa kavramsayarı etrafınızdaki dünyadan ayırıyor.{/n}
